ygData.subject: My (limited) exp with research:
ygData.msgSnippet: 1st thing is i wish folks would limit their discussion to Research related topics. 2 times already i almost unsubscribed because of the off subject discussions
ygData.messageBody:
1st thing is i wish folks would limit their discussion to Research
related topics. 2 times already i almost unsubscribed because of the off
subject discussions luckelly both of these times someone managed an
email on research or on languages wich i have found very usuafull.

Anyways, i finnally decided to take some time and start researching
(bank was getting too full) here is my limited experience:

I researched with the appropriate book open and in my inventory, since i
have heard that it somehow helps success rate.
I researched with all intel and wisdom gear on me that i do not normally
wear to increase success rate.
I researched with only runes that are listed in the books and did not
add anything extra.
I researched only spells that are below my current lvl,since apparantly
we cannot research something above our own current circle.

i started my 1st wizard research spell at about skill 47, did it 12
times and gained 3 skill points to 50th skill:

The 1st 2 i did were 2 spells of the 16th lvl, 2 tried, 2 success (they
were trivial so no skill gain but a friend needed them)

I skipped 20th,and went to 24th lvl spells 9 times, 6 successfull, 2 i
lacked the skill to produced spell.Gained 3 skill point.
i messed up one by not paying attention and (i assume) put the wrong
runes, got the message that the combination did not produce anything.

Next, i tried my hand on 29th one time. Unfortunatly after putting the
correct runes(29th take 3 runes) and combining they did not combine to
produce anything . so i am assuming that 29th spells need a 4th
component, the book did not mention anything else so i am clueless as to
what else is needed.

If anyone can shed some light as to wether something else is needed
after 29th , i would appreciate it.
Also i am quiet puzzled by runes wich do not appear in any of the 4
books. Guess there must be more books out there,maybe quest rewards?


BTW i am on solusek Ro server and have lots of words and pages (more
than 30) that i would be willing to trade for runes, or exchange them
for learning book languages.


Bull
